divs: Sighting DetailsI looked into the distance and saw a orange dot fly up from the distance as it reached high up in the sky it hovered for around 4 minutes and it gradualy moved towards the right and a tiny white dot appeared and the orange dot came together and turned white then disappeared. I was walking home from playing football with my brother. At first i thought it was some kind of flair untill it didnt disappear and it kept going up into the sky, it flew up really fast then stopped and veired right untill it turned white when it touched a white dot that appeared it disappeared. Im quite scared and as soon as me and my brother saw it we ran home and told my mum and now im reporting it, it disappeared behind a cloud then i havnt seen it since.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Preston
There were no other sightings in Preston on or around May 2nd 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: A small orange dot in the sky.
